game_description: Ready to face a challenge up in the air??!! In this multiplayer game you will have to prove your aiming skills by bursting your rival's balloons. Create a local party or organize a remote one. Challenge your friends to a VR Balloon Battle!!!
review_1: The developer here. This is a 2 player local game. There is no option for a single player game. Please, consider not to play it if you don't plan to play it with 2 players. You can play against smartphone if you don't have 2 Quest. Both Google Play (Android) and Apple Store(IOS) are supported. Just look for the name of the game in that stores. Thanks for your consideration.
